para.p:
Let
S
be the collection of Schwartz functions
→ R C
and let
S ′
be its dual space, whose elements are called tempered distributions. For
∈ ϕ S
, for
> k j
,

Math.text: absolute-value@((integral _ A _ (1 / j))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x)) - (integral _ A _ (1 / k))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x))) = absolute-value@((integral _ (1 / k less= absolute-value@(x) less 1 / j))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x)))
absolute-value@((integral _ A _ (1 / j))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x)) - (integral _ A _ (1 / k))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x)))
absent = absolute-value@((integral _ (1 / k less= absolute-value@(x) less 1 / j))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x)))
absent = absolute-value@((integral _ (1 / k less= absolute-value@(x) less 1 / j))@(((phi * x - phi * 0) / x) * differential-d@(x)))
absent = absolute-value@((integral _ (1 / k less= absolute-value@(x) less 1 / j))@(((phi * x - phi * 0) / x) * differential-d@(x)))
absent less= (integral _ (1 / k less= absolute-value@(x) less 1 / j))@((norm@(phi ^ prime)) _ b)
absent less= (integral _ (1 / k less= absolute-value@(x) less 1 / j))@((norm@(phi ^ prime)) _ b)
absent = (norm@(phi ^ prime)) _ b cdot (1 / j - 1 / k)
absent = (norm@(phi ^ prime)) _ b cdot (1 / j - 1 / k)
absent = (norm@(phi ^ prime)) _ b cdot ((k - j) / (k * j))
absent = (norm@(phi ^ prime)) _ b cdot ((k - j) / (k * j))
absent less= (norm@(phi ^ prime)) _ b / j
absent less= (norm@(phi ^ prime)) _ b / j

Math.text: ((integral _ epsilon) ^ 1)@(phi ^ prime * x * logarithm@(x * d * x)) = evaluated-at@(x * psi * x * logarithm@(x), epsilon, 1) - ((integral _ epsilon) ^ 1)@((phi * x - phi * 0) * (1 / x) * differential-d@(x))
((integral _ epsilon) ^ 1)@(phi ^ prime * x * logarithm@(x * d * x))

absent = - epsilon * psi * epsilon * logarithm@(epsilon) - ((integral _ epsilon) ^ 1)@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x)) - phi * 0 * logarithm@(epsilon)
absent = - epsilon * psi * epsilon * logarithm@(epsilon) - ((integral _ epsilon) ^ 1)@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x)) - phi * 0 * logarithm@(epsilon)

((integral _ (- 1)) ^ (- epsilon))@(phi ^ prime * x * logarithm@(absolute-value@(x) * d * x)) = evaluated-at@(x * psi * x * logarithm@(- x), - 1, - epsilon) - ((integral _ (- 1)) ^ (- epsilon))@((phi * x - phi * 0) * (1 / x) * differential-d@(x))

absent = (- epsilon * psi * (- epsilon) * logarithm@(epsilon) - ((integral _ (- 1)) ^ (- epsilon))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x))) + phi * 0 * logarithm@(epsilon)
absent = (- epsilon * psi * (- epsilon) * logarithm@(epsilon) - ((integral _ (- 1)) ^ (- epsilon))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x))) + phi * 0 * logarithm@(epsilon)

(integral _ (epsilon less= absolute-value@(x) less= 1))@(phi ^ prime * x * logarithm@(absolute-value@(x) * d * x)) = - epsilon cdot (psi * epsilon + psi * (- epsilon)) cdot logarithm@(epsilon) - (integral _ (epsilon less= absolute-value@(x) less= 1))@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x))

P * V * (integral _ R)@(phi ^ prime * x * logarithm@(absolute-value@(x) * d * x)) = - P * V * (integral _ R)@(((phi * x) / x) * differential-d@(x))

para.p: Then, using the dominated convergence theorem,

Math.text: widehat@(phi * u) = widehat@(phi) cdot widehat@(u)
m _ H * xi = - (i cdot sgn) * xi

F * H * phi = (m _ H cdot F) * phi
H * phi = F ^ (- 1) * (m _ H cdot F) * phi
H ^ 2 * phi = F ^ (- 1) * (m _ H cdot F) * H * phi = F ^ (- 1) * (m _ H cdot m _ H) * F * phi

Math.tex: \displaystyle\int_{\mathbb{R}}e^{2\pi i\xi x}e^{-2\pi y|\xi|}d\xi=\frac{1}{2% \pi ix+2\pi y}-\frac{1}{2\pi ix-2\pi y}
Math.text: (integral _ R)@(e ^ (2 * pi * i * xi * x) * e ^ (- 2 * pi * y * absolute-value@(xi)) * differential-d@(xi)) = 1 / (2 * pi * i * x + 2 * pi * y) - 1 / (2 * pi * i * x - 2 * pi * y)

absent = (2 * pi * i * x - 2 * pi * y - 2 * pi * i * x - 2 * pi * y) / (- 4 * pi ^ 2 * x ^ 2 - 4 * pi ^ 2 * y ^ 2)
absent = y / (pi * (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2))
absent = y / (pi * (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2))

absent = x / (pi * (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2))
absent = x / (pi * (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2))
(widehat@(P)) _ y * xi = e ^ (- 2 * pi * y * absolute-value@(xi))

para.p:
For a Borel measurable function
: f
→ R C
for which the integral exists,

Math.text: P _ y * f * x = (integral _ R)@(P _ y * (x - t) * f * t * differential-d@(t))
P _ y * f * x
absent = (integral _ R)@(P _ y * (x - t) * f * t * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * t * (y / (pi * ((x - t) ^ 2 + y ^ 2))) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * t * (y / (pi * ((x - t) ^ 2 + y ^ 2))) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * (x - t) * (y / (pi * (t ^ 2 + y ^ 2))) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * (x - t) * (y / (pi * (t ^ 2 + y ^ 2))) * differential-d@(t))
Q _ y * f * x = (integral _ R)@(Q _ y * (x - t) * f * t * differential-d@(t))
Q _ y * f * x
absent = (integral _ R)@(Q _ y * (x - t) * f * t * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * t * ((x - t) / (pi * ((x - t) ^ 2 + y ^ 2))) * differential-d@(t))

absent = (integral _ R)@(f * (x - t) * (t / (pi * (t ^ 2 + y ^ 2))) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * (x - t) * (t / (pi * (t ^ 2 + y ^ 2))) * differential-d@(t))
P _ y * f * x + i * Q _ y * f * x = (integral _ R)@(f * (x - t) * (1 / pi) * (1 / (y - i * t)) * differential-d@(t))
P _ y * f * x + i * Q _ y * f * x
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * (x - t) * (1 / pi) * (1 / (y - i * t)) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * t * (1 / pi) * (1 / ((y - i * x) + i * t)) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ R)@(f * t * (1 / pi) * (1 / ((y - i * x) + i * t)) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (i / pi) * (integral _ R)@(((f * t) / ((x + i * y) - t)) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (i / pi) * (integral _ R)@(((f * t) / ((x + i * y) - t)) * differential-d@(t))
widehat@(P _ y _ 1 * P _ y _ 2) * xi = ((widehat@(P _ y _ 1) * xi) cdot widehat@(P _ y _ 2)) * xi
widehat@(P _ y _ 1 * P _ y _ 2) * xi
absent = ((widehat@(P _ y _ 1) * xi) cdot widehat@(P _ y _ 2)) * xi
absent = e ^ (- 2 * pi * y _ 1 * absolute-value@(xi)) cdot e ^ (- 2 * pi * y _ 2 * absolute-value@(xi))
absent = e ^ (- 2 * pi * y _ 1 * absolute-value@(xi)) cdot e ^ (- 2 * pi * y _ 2 * absolute-value@(xi))
absent = e ^ (- 2 * pi * (y _ 1 + y _ 2) * absolute-value@(xi))
absent = e ^ (- 2 * pi * (y _ 1 + y _ 2) * absolute-value@(xi))
absent = widehat@(P _ (y _ 1 + y _ 2)) * xi
absent = widehat@(P _ (y _ 1 + y _ 2)) * xi
